description: The Division of Criminal Justice Services (DCJS) collects personnel statistics from more than 500 New York State police and sheriffs’ departments. In New York State, law enforcement agencies use the Uniform Crime Reporting (UCR) system to report their annual personnel counts to DCJS.

metadata.attribution: New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services
metadata.description: The Division of Criminal Justice Services (DCJS) collects personnel statistics from more than 500 New York State police and sheriffs’ departments. In New York State, law enforcement agencies use the Uniform Crime Reporting (UCR) system to report their annual personnel counts to DCJS.

name: Law Enforcement Personnel by Agency:  Beginning 2007
